A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was an excellent installment to the Star Wars saga. It refocused the direction that Abrams had set out in TFA. Fanboys are going to tell you that the film doesn't meet up to expectations\, but I believe it meets every goal it sets out to make. See it for yourself\, focus on the paths and development of the new characters\, and marvel at Adam Driver's performance as Kylo Ten.
